Posts.Content:
Hello Everyone!
I am a 26 year old mother of 3 (all of whom I breastfed). 
 I have for some time now had very large hair follicles, that are extremely noticeable. Breast tenderness and irregular burning pain. I have on the side of my left nipple a raised up, what I think is a mongomery's gland, but there is something odd about
 it. It has a hole in the center and discharges what I compare to what is inside of a pimple. Does anybody have anything to say about
 these symptoms? Any one have anything similar?
Posts.Title: Waiting for testing,but are these breast symptoms normal?
